item.title: Federal Reserve Is Powerless Against A New Recession
item.description:
Federal Reserve Is Powerless Against A New Recession

There are a lot of eyes on the Federal Reserve right now. Many financial experts assume the interest rates will increase again later this year. But at the same time, there are those who feel the opposite will be true.

item.title: So, What The Heck Are Bitcoin Blockchains?
item.description:
So, What The Heck Are Bitcoin Blockchains?

Bitcoin blockchains use self-interest and greed to secure funds... and it works. Here's how.

item.title: Cannabis Entrepreneurs Should Use Bitcoin as Legalization Grows
item.description:
Cannabis Entrepreneurs Should Use Bitcoin as Legalization Grows

This coming election, more states are set to join the legalized cannabis campaign, opting to regulating the flower like alcohol. Just recently, it has been Also read: Bitcoin is Not A Safe Haven and That's OK announced that Arizona will be voting on legalizing the plant, with Massachusetts will be following suit .

item.title: Will the bitcoin price surge or drop on July 7th 2016 (Bitcoin halving)?
item.description:
Will the bitcoin price surge or drop on July 7th 2016 (Bitcoin halving)?

Answer (1 of 3): It's all a matter of speculation. Miners current supply rates are such a minimal generation daily compared to daily market volume, so in the "withholding of selling" by miners when this reward halves to try to push up price, they are withering very little supply from the market.

item.title: Uber Argentina Turns to Bitcoin to Evade Government Crackdown | Pete Rizzo
item.description:
Uber Argentina Turns to Bitcoin to Evade Government Crackdown | Pete Rizzo

The Argentinian subsidiary of international ridesharing giant Uber is turning to bitcoin amid what has been described as a crackdown by local authorities on its operations. Bitcoin industry startup Xapo told CoinDesk today that is has entered a partnership with Uber that allows the company to accept its bitcoin debit cards, and for users to use the payment option when traveling domestically or abroad.

item.title: US, UK or Asia - Where are all the blockchain startups?
item.description:
US, UK or Asia - Where are all the blockchain startups?

After the launch of the blockchain angels startup tracker and the explosive growth of the tracker from 760 at launch, we now have 967 startups listed in the ecosystem tracker. In 6 weeks, over 200 new startups have been added. We hope to reach the milestone of 1000 blockchain startups by the end of July.

item.title: The Tatiana Show - Matt McKibbin of D10E & Liz Reitzig of NourishingLiberty com | Lets Talk Bitcoin
item.description:
The Tatiana Show - Matt McKibbin of D10E & Liz Reitzig of NourishingLiberty com | Lets Talk Bitcoin

Tatiana interviews Matt McKibbin of D10E & Liz Reitzig of NourishingLiberty.com. Topics of discussion include the different beliefs in Bitcoin among the Bitcoin community, the future of Blockchain in real estate, getting farmers to adapt to technology, and the role of government in the farming industry.

item.title: Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - $11.20 Now Major Resistance - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Ethereum Price Technical Analysis - $11.20 Now Major Resistance - NEWSBTC

Ethereum price weakened, as the bears did not stop in taking the ETH down against the US Dollar. More losses ahead? Ethereum price weakened, as the bears did not stop in taking the ETH down against the US Dollar. More losses ahead? Ethereum price continued to dive down against the US Dollar and even broke the $9.50 level.

item.title: Counterparty's EVM Port to Enable Bitcoin with Ethereum Smart Contracts Moves Forward
item.description:
Counterparty's EVM Port to Enable Bitcoin with Ethereum Smart Contracts Moves Forward

Counterparty is set to launch Ethereum's Virtual Machine (EVM) on a testnet in two weeks with Counterparty developer Ruben de Vries making solid progress toward the end result, which will eventually bring Ethereum's smart contract to Bitcoin.
